articles.content:
Dear Reader,

articles.author: Sohini Sengupta
articles.title: Anand Mahindra reacts to Tesla vs. Mahindra meme, featuring Pankaj Tripathi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This tweet that has been quoted by Anand Mahindra, shows his reaction to an Elon Musk's Tesla vs. Mahindra meme that features Pankaj Tripathi.  | Trending
articles.content: Anand Mahindra, the chairperson of Mahindra and Mahindra is quite regular when it comes to using social media, especially Twitter. This time, he has taken to his personal, verified handle in order to… [+845 chars]
